title: VIP Program
description: Get access to exclusive benefits and reduced fees

fees.title: Reduced Fees
fees.description: Better trading fees for all pairs

howToGet.title: How to get VIP status?
howToGet.description: To get VIP status, you need to meet one of the following conditions

conditions.volume: Reach the required trading volume in the last 30 days
conditions.balance: Maintain the required BNB balance in your account

howToGet.note: VIP status is recalculated every 24 hours. You will automatically receive the corresponding level when you meet the requirements.
